data.title: Turn on the Bluetooth & Swipe to unlock the scooter
data.sub_title: This scooter is now ready to ride.

data.title: To start moving forward:
data.sub_title:
1. Turn on the ignition switch
2. Accelerate carefully

data.title: Tap on 'Open Trunk' for helmet
data.sub_title: Open trunk & take out the helmet. Keep it back in the trunk after your ride.

data.title: Use app to 'Lock  & 'Unlock' scooter
data.sub_title: To pause ride, park in a valid parking spot & tap 'Lock' on the app. Resume ride, by tapping 'UNLOCK' on the app.

data.title: Turn off the ignition switch & 'End Ride' from the app
data.sub_title: Tap on 'End Ride' on the app & don't forget to share your feedback to help us serve you better.

data.title: This is an electric scooter
data.sub_title:
1. It has no self-start
2. Accelerate very slowly, to avoid jump-starts.
3. Don't hold the brakes while trying to start the scooter.
4. This scooter does not make any sound.
